card_text: Activate 1 of these effects;$N●Add 1 "Salamangreat" monster from your Deck to your hand.$N●Target 1 "Salamangreat" Link Monster you control that was Link Summoned using a monster with its same name as material; that Link Monster is unaffected by monster effects this turn, except its own.$NYou can only activate 1 "Salamangreat Circle" per turn.
